answer:
The schedule for Menjugate varies depending on the age when received. Please call your local public health unit and ask to speak to a public health nurse who will be able to advise you. You will find the number for your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## The schedule for Menjugate varies depending on the age when received.

Please call your local public health unit and ask to speak to a public health nurse who will be able to advise you.
You will find the number for your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: My son was immunized for meningitis (Menjugate) in October, 2014. Should he have another dose of the vaccine at this time?
question_variation_0: is menjugate meningitis vaccine another dose?
question_variation_2: does menjugate work if mmh vaccine is not renewed
